title: Manage a New Stock Option Grant
description: A newly promoted employee is receiving a stock option grant as part of their promotion.

tasks.description: Receive the approved grant details (number of shares, strike price, vesting schedule).
tasks.expected_outcome: The compensation analyst receives the grant information.

tasks.description: Enter the new grant into the equity administration platform (e.g., Carta, Shareworks).
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully creates the new grant in the system.

tasks.description: Generate and send the grant agreement to the employee for acceptance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst sends the agreement for e-signature.
